backend/main.mo: Main canister actor managing access control, user profiles, and CRUD lists for episodes, characters, clans, gallery items, news posts, and scripts.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing frontend components, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color variables, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component using hash-based routing to display either the main site or the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Gatekeeper component that checks Internet Identity authentication and admin status before showing the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard layout with tabbed panels for managing all content types, plus navigation back to the main site.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Cha: Admin interface for listing, creating, editing, and deleting characters with metadata encoding and validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Cla: Admin panel for listing, creating, editing, and deleting clans, including metadata encoding and form dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Epi: Admin interface to manage episodes with create/edit forms, metadata encoding, and deletion handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Gal: Admin panel for managing gallery items with image upload/validation, metadata handling, and CRUD dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/New: Simple admin panel for creating, editing, and deleting news posts using a basic title/content form.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Scr: Panel for managing script entries with create/edit workflows, permission-aware error handling, and CRUD support.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Tea: Admin panel for listing team members, granting or revoking roles, and adding new principals with error handling. Shows restricted access messages and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and retry logic. Clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/characters/Chara: Displays a character with animated styling, clan-based colors, and details like personality, power, and role. Supports reduced-motion preferences and staggered animations.
Renders a styled badge for a clan with pulse animation and accent-based colors. Adjusts animations based on motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/clans/ClanCard.t: Shows a detailed clan card with animations, glow effects, sigil image, and description. Uses motion preferences for animation behavior.
frontend/src/components/episodes/Episode: Displays an episode summary with release status, number, and optional watch button. Highlights released episodes with color cues.
Modal dialog that plays an episode’s video or shows an unavailable alert. Includes metadata like title, number, and summary.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryG: Image gallery with category filtering and responsive grid layout. Handles tabs, category selection, and image click callbacks.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryU: Upload dialog allowing admins to drag, drop, validate, preview, and submit new gallery images with metadata.
frontend/src/components/news/NewPostForm: Form for creating a new news post with validation, error display, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsPostCar: Card component that displays a news post’s title, author, formatted timestamp, and content.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Animated section presenting series lore highlights with feature cards revealed on scroll.
frontend/src/components/sections/Charact: Character listing section that loads characters from the backend, decodes metadata, and renders cards with loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/sections/ClansSe: Clan showcase section that loads clan data, merges metadata with static styling, and displays animated clan cards with fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/sections/Episode: Fetches, transforms, and displays a list of episodes with watch handling and a player dialog.
Renders the site footer with brand info, quick navigation links, social icons, and scroll‑reveal animation.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Loads and displays gallery items with lightbox navigation and optional admin upload controls.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeaderN: Provides a responsive navigation bar with scroll effects, section scrolling, mobile menu, and admin link.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Creates an animated hero banner with particles, parallax background, and title content.
frontend/src/components/sections/NewsUpd: Manages news posts, profile setup, and admin posting with loading states and sorted display.
frontend/src/data/characters.ts: Defines the Character interface and a list of character data including traits, powers, and roles.
frontend/src/data/clans.ts: Defines the Clan interface and a set of clan descriptions with styling metadata.
frontend/src/data/episodes.ts: Provides the Episode interface and Season 1 episode list with status and summaries.
frontend/src/data/gallery.ts: Defines gallery item structure and exports a small set of gallery entries and categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context for login, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Hook that applies scroll-based parallax transforms to a referenced element.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects system reduced-motion preference and updates state on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for profiles, roles, episodes, and other entities.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Hook providing intersection-based reveal-on-scroll behavior with reduced-motion handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme variables, glow utilities, gradients, and animation utilities for the site's dramatic aesthetic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Provides encode/decode helpers for storing metadata in content fields and retrieves fallback clan styling.
frontend/src/utils/galleryImageUpload.ts: Validates image uploads for MIME type and size, converting valid files to data URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color variables, glow shadows, containers, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, design goals, architecture notes, known issues, and tracked features for the site.
